item.title: 692. Top K Frequent Words
item.description: 1 Description # source: https://leetcode.com/problems/top-k-frequent-words/ Given an array of strings words and an integer k, return the k most frequent strings. Return the answer sorted by the frequency from highest to lowest. Sort the words with the same frequency by their lexicographical order. Example 1: Input: words = ["i","love","leetcode","i","love","coding"], k = 2 Output: ["i","love"] Explanation: "i" and "love" are the two most frequent words. Note that "i" comes before "love" due to a lower alphabetical order.
